items.name: Progenesis
explicitMods: 19% reduced Charges per use
35% increased Duration
When Hit during effect, 25% of Life loss from Damage taken occurs over 4 seconds instead
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: They were bred in a cosmic ocean of raw creation.
Feasting and drinking of the milk of the mother,
they fought to the death for every last drop.

items.name: Call of the Brotherhood
enchantMods: Your Chilling Towers freeze enemies for 0.2 seconds while they are affected by chilling beams
explicitMods: +22 to Intelligence
25% increased Lightning Damage
35% increased Mana Regeneration Rate
48% of Lightning Damage Converted to Cold Damage
Your spells have 100% chance to Shock against Frozen Enemies
flavourText: Forged by three brothers
so that they may recognize each other
across any distance of time or travel.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff that protects the lower half of your life, preventing some of the immediate life loss when damaged by hits and applying the loss over time instead. Life Recovery other than Flasks cannot Recover Life to above Low Life
When taking Damage from Hits, 45% of Life loss below half Life is Prevented, then 140% of Life loss prevented this way is lost over 4 seconds
Skills gain a Base Life Cost equal to 40% of Base Mana Cost while not on Low Life
